npc_output: My name is Patrick Garza, nice to meet you!
Hello there, I'm Nicholas Graves, what brings you here?
Hi, I'm Ariana Hardin, isn't it a lovely stormy day?
It's going well, thanks for asking, I'm Hannah Cruz, sailor extraordinaire!
I'm Noah Mann, the innkeeper, and I'm tired but happy to serve you, |r1|.
Hi there, I'm James Haynes, sailor at your service, excited to be on this stormy adventure!
Hello! I'm Melanie Fisher, a humble beggar, may I have some spare change?
Not much, just fishing, I'm Donald Cooper, nice to meet you, want to hear about my catch?
I'm a bit down, but sewing always cheers me up, I'm Andrew Williams, tailor, |r2|.
Hi! I'm Cynthia Green, hunter, and I'm feeling a bit anxious, but music always helps, |r3|.
